root.name: angleMode()
root.description: Sets the argument type for trigonometic functions such as sin() and the rotation transformations such as rotate(). The default mode is angleMode(RADIANS) and the other option is angleMode(DEGREES). Degrees are the angles of a circle in terms of 0 to 360 and radians are the angles of a circle in terms of 0 to PI*2 (6.28). The parameter must be written in "ALL CAPS" because Processing is a case sensitive language.
